content.question: What does Mr. Yamaguchi imply about the benefit of volunteer activities?

choices.label: Children can gain experience contributing to society.
Doing volunteer work promotes good health.
Children improve their time management skills.

content.answer: Children can gain experience contributing to society.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
